name: The Source of All Evil
description: Etna & Flonne's trial for the most powerful Overlord starts soon!

name: Overlord Cosplay
description: A mysterious voice came out of nowhere... Who was that? And what's he up to!?

name: Hell's Kitchen
description: Laharl's transformation leads to an unpredictable turn of events...

name: Dark Hero's Sorrow
description: Disgusted by her unreliable vassal, Girl Laharl decides to restore her former body on her own.

name: Storming the Dark Assembly
description: With the very best bribe, Girl Laharl triumphantly heads to the Dark Assembly. But...

name: The Mischievous Academy
description: The next stage for training the most powerful Overlord takes us to the Evil Academy, where the values of good and evil are completely reversed...

name: Schoolhouse of Evil
description: Having avoided expulsion at Mao's hands, life at the academy is finally about to begin. However...

name: Waste Incinerator
description: As the party attends class to become Delinquents, Mr. You-Know-Who stands in their way again!

name: Gold Mine of Desire
description: Today's lesson is on "Fundraising". What is Raspberyl's real purpose? She's definitely up to no good.

name: Fork of Destruction
description: Finally, the ultimate class begins. Can the party graduate as true Delinquents?

name: Love is a War
description: What is power? What is love? A bittersweet romantic comedy begins now! Please enjoy watching Love Revolution DISGAEA!

name: The Spirited Girl-in-Love
description: Two girls suddenly show up to provide Rozalin with "love training" (?) in order to win back the runaway Adell. Heh!

name: Poisonous Swamp of Love
description: In front of Rozalin is the trial of the poisonous swamp. In spite of her Status Ailment, she heads straight in along the rugged path of love!

name: Boiling Sea of Love
description: A girl in love will choose to risk her life. Giving up is not an option. Let the flames of love burn!

name: The Battlefield of Love
description: After overcoming many challenges, Rozalin has become the warrior of love and is now heading to where Adell is waiting. But...?

name: Revolutionary Love Front
description: Adell has been freed, but Zenon has awakened. Can the party save Rozalin...?

name: Snowy Road of Love
description: The party is searching for the puppeteer behind the scenes when Mr. You-Know-Who shows up again...!!

name: Training Ground of Love
description: After defeating the Dark Hero, Adell starts to search his memory for the truth.

name: Wretched Plain of Love
description: The true identity of the puppeteer turns out to be Former Archangel Vulcanus. What's he up to...?

name: Eternal Circuit of Love
description: Power is love and love is power. Now, a trial for the love of two!!

name: Solving the Labyrinth
description: Just as the permanence of love has been witnessed, news of a Prinny tragedy comes in... The Nether Detective stands forward...

name: The Monopoly
description: With clues concealed in a fog of confusion, another murder occurs. To save the Prinnies, a true Detective must emerge!

name: Sardine Fishery
description: To unravel the truth behind the Prinny murders, the detective redoubles all efforts. But the barbarous crimes continue...

name: The Sad Crimson Moon
description: "Want to know whodunit?" A new character appears. Now the tide is turning.

name: The Sinful End
description: The showdown, finally! In the name of the Prinny Instructor, here comes revenge!

name: Map of the Great War
description: In the words of the Seraph, a shocking truth is revealed... To save the world, the party must find the Five Original Overlords.

name: The Scorching Flame
description: To revive the Five Original Overlords, Etna and her friends visit the Scorching Flame Netherworld. Will they accomplish their task...

name: Symbol of Awe
description:
※※※Spoiler Alert※※※
 The true identity of the Final Boss will be revealed here.

name: The Lost Haven
description: Three Original Overlords to go, but Killia seems to be distracted by something...

name: Claw Mark of the Tyrant
description: Once again determined, Killia starts to tell of the epic animosity between him and his destined enemy, Tyrant Overlord Baal...

name: Sanctuary of the Fist
description: The one who shows up before Killia is Zeroken, his junior disciple. Shocking sexy beam episode

name: Closed Heart
description: Two Original Overlords to go. For the battle against Tyrant Overlord Baal, Killia hurries forward with his friends. But...

name: Feast of Curry
description: Usalia and Seraphina just won't wake up. What on earth happened to them...!?

name: The Battle of Fate
description: All Five Original Overlords have been awakened, but the dark solar meteor shower is coming. The one who comes to save the day appears. But who is this savior...

name: A Stage Staged
description: The battle against Tyrant Overlord Baal has begun. Joy at forming the dream team is short-lived. Battle must continue.

name: Holy Puppet Show
description: It's the final stage of Overlord training. Before the battle with the Final Boss can begin, a final trial awaits. However...

name: Tree of Stardust
description: The next opponent is Flonne, the warrior of love. But an accident happens on her long-awaited debut.

name: The Crossing
description: Flonne keeps transforming. Her power of love that makes the impossible possible finally reveals itself!

name: Majin's Armory
description: As the opponent of the final trial, Etna now stands in the way! And what is her true hidden power...

name: The Fateful Divide
description: Completely exhausted in the final trial, Flonne and her friends are now targeted by evil hands...!

name: Indelible Scars
description: Laharl announced a gathering during Flonne and Etna's absence! There was no time for grief as new enemies were making their move.

name: Guidepost for the Lost
description: Let Valvatorez join and bring the brainwashed Prinnies back to normal.

name: Hero's Hunting Ground
description: It appeared as though the fuss with the Prinnies and the Red Moon was down to the Super Hero Aurum. However, an even greater evil was lurking behind.

name: Creeping Abyss
description: A powerful Prinny Bomb was created to devastate the world. The party sets out to the Red Moon to save the Prinnies and the world.

name: Beckoning Tragedy
description: The expansion of the Prinny Bomb was beyond expectation. What will Laharl and his friends do?

name: Realm of Absolute Darkness
description: The mastermind has finally been cornered. After all these trials and hardships, it's finally showtime!

name: The Tombstone of the Fool
description: Axel showed up to interfere yet again as Laharl's party was about to challenge the Final Boss. Something wasn't quite right about him...

name: Instantaneous Easter
description: With enough medicine for two in hand, the party hurried back to where Etna was. Finally, the rowdy times were about to return...

name: Imminent Death
description: Vulcanus, in the company of Fallen Celestial Hosts. But here comes the counterattack from an angry Etna!

name: The Great War Festival
description: The memories of all those battles keep coming back. What will become of the training of the strongest Overlord and the final battle...

name: The Five Protagonists Assembled?!
description: The five protagonists, including Laharl, have formed the Netherworld Force - DISGAEA V, united as one! Has something gone wrong again...?

name: Love and Justice!
description: To stop the Netherworld from collapsing, Flonne and Etna stand up to confront the furious Laharl. Flonne seems to have a clever plan.

name: Fierce Fighting Machine
description: Just like Laharl, Adell is also furious about Mao. There is only one way to stop this fierce fighting machine...!

name: Unexpected
description: Although Adell and Laharl are mad at Mao, Flonne and Etna tried to hear his side of the story, however, Mao seems to be enraged also...

name: Netherworld Extinction?
description: Something is odd about what the five protagonists had to say... However, everyone has already become uncontrollably angry...

name: A New Show?!
description: The grand finale of Netherworld Force DISGAEA V? Etna is planning to start a new show...

name: Reunion with Them
description: Rozalin sensed danger and at that moment an unexpected character appeared.

name: The Search for Adell...
description: Having encountered Fake Zenon again, Etna, Flonne, and Rozalin decided to search for Adell together...

name: Adell's Determination
description: Hearing Salvatore's words, Adell decided to make up with Rozalin. Will they be able to reconcile?

name: Another Rare Guest?
description: Seeing Rozalin defending Fake Zenon, Adell left on his own. A rare guest appeared before the squad...

name: A New Problem!
description: After the squad accepted their new member (Lucy), they started to discuss their future... when Prinnies brought them some shocking news!

name: The Netherworld Game
description: Flonne and Etna experienced Laharl's wrath first hand. Will they ever be able to find Laharl?

name: Using the Boss to Test Skills
description: Before challenging Laharl, the squad decided to test their mettle with a boss... when a very familiar figure appeared in front of them!

name: Final Boss & Final Showdown
description: The squad only wanted to test their strength, to their surprise, they ended up fighting the final boss... Will their journey come to an end before they even find Laharl?

name: Spreading War
description: The squad has found Laharl and the others' location, thanks to the clues that Flonne and Etna discovered! Can they stop the war?

name: A New Battlefield?
description: Laharl's war has come to an end, but now news of another "war" between Valvatorez and Killia is spreading...

name: Culinary Contest
description: In this culinary contest, all violence is strictly forbidden. All participants are ready for a culinary duel!

name: A Chef's Spirit
description: What is cooking? Cooking is a clash between ingredients, a pilgrimage to find the ultimate form of dishes, and an adventure to learn the essence of food.

name: Rare Guests
description: Lucy is busy cooking, Diez is doing nothing, and Torachiyo is enjoying his rice balls. What are these rare guests planning?

name: And the Winner is...?!
description: The cooking battle is in full swing. Who will win this glorious battle?!

name: Adell's Objective
description: What exactly is Adell doing in the "Love Lab", a place that clearly reeks of conspiracies?

name: Love Event Starts!
description: Adell has started a love event. What kind of event is he holding, in this facility that can satisfy the need of anyone?

name: Love Event Is on!!
description: Rozalin finally met with Adell. When they were busy bickering, a love contest with Adell at the center has somehow gotten underway!

name: Mao's Conspiracy
description: Despite the chaos, the squad successfully resolved their problems... Now Mao has appeared out of nowhere, just what is he planning?!

name: Super Overlord Love Cell
description: After Mao became one with the ultimate cell, he was supposed to resonate with the love energy and become even more powerful. However...

name: Netherworld's Strongest Tournament
description: A message arrives about the Netherworld's Strongest Tournament hosted by Laharl, which is starting soon.

name: The Tournament Begins
description: Despite some trouble, the team is assembled! The battle to decide the Netherworld's strongest warriors is about to begin!

name: Qualifiers!
description: Powerful teams jostle for supremacy in the qualifiers... Win the qualifier and punch your ticket to the elimination tournament!

name: Qualifiers Round 2
description: You won the first round, so it's on to the second! Beat down the next team and punch your ticket to the elimination tournament!

name: Qualifiers Final
description: It's time for the final round of the qualifiers! Winning here will secure you a place in the elimination tournament.

name: Eve of the Elimination
description:
It is the night before the elimination tournament.
Adell and Rozalin confide in each other their thoughts.

name: Elimination Begins
description:
The elimination tournament finally begins!
Defeat the powerful teams who have won out in the qualifiers, and seize victory!

name: Quarter-finals
description:
Your opponent in the quarter-finals is Team Sardine Curry, which is led by Valvatorez and Killia.
Defeat them and proceed to the semi-finals!

name: Semi-finals
description:
Your opponent in the semi-finals is Team Rice Ball.
Who will prevail in this battle for Rozalin between Adell and fake Zenon?!

name: Finals
description: In the finals to determine the strongest in the Netherworld, your opponent is of course that lord. Since you've come this far, why not capture the title of Overlord?!

name: Abundant EXP Gate
description: A gate that gives you a ton of EXP

name: Abundant HL Gate
description: A gate that gives you a ton of HL

name: Abundant Statues Gate
description: A gate that gives you a ton of statues

name: Abundant WM EXP Gate
description: A gate that gives you a ton of WM EXP

name: Abundant Skill EXP Gate
description: A gate that gives you a ton of Skill EXP

name: Final Battle! The Final Boss vs. The Final Boss
heading: EP 8

name: Final Battle! The Moon, The Earth, The Promise
heading: EP 9

name: Investigation Start!
description: Gordon, the Defender of Earth, arrives in the Netherworld to investigate the disappearance of Prinnies! What awaits him is...

name: Search for the Hero!
description: While searching for Almaz the Hero who was separated from Princess Sapphire,

name: Enemies Emerge!
description: Demons stand in the way of the search for Almaz! And the person controlling them is...

name: Almaz is the Overlord!?
description: The true mastermind is Almaz, whom they've been searching for?

name: Strategic Retreat!
description: Defeated by Almaz, the party has to fight through their demonic pursuers in order to retreat.

name: Information Gathering!
description: The party starts to gather information about the hero title in order to deal with the demon title.

name: Another Hero!
description: Knowing the weaknesses of the demon title, the party decides to find the hero title.

name: Almaz's Title!
description: Don Joaquin entrusts the title of hero to the party who have overcome the trial.

name: Almaz Once More!
description: The party confronts Almaz again with the hero title, only to find that Almaz's title has been upgraded to "Knock-off Overlord"!

name: Showdown with the Great Overlord!
description: The demon title that escaped from Almaz has materialized! Thus becoming Prinny the Great Overlord!

name: Prinny Bomb!
description: The Prinny bomb has already begun the detonation countdown! At this critical moment, Almaz has a great idea!

name: Kurtis' Determination!
description: In order to enter the core of the Prinny Bomb, Kurtis proposes a self-sacrificing plan!

name: Persuasion Begins!
description: The group managed to get into the core of the Prinny Bomb and started their persuasion plan!

name: Vato Brothers!
description: Outnumbered by enemies and facing a ticking clock, they are now confronted by the Vato Brothers! What exactly are they up to?

name: The Final Showdown!
description: As the squad persuades the Prinnies, the counterfeit Prinny Baal, who possesses the power to destroy the world, has appeared!

name: Follow your feelings
description: Maybe it's because of the Santa costume, but Usalia and the Mage sense a mysterious presence. What will it reveal to them?

name: Knew it Was You
description: Prinnies bearing gifts were seen by Laharl and the others. Could they be the masterminds behind all this?

name: Evil Academy's Holy Night
description: The Evil Academy on Christmas Eve. Cheer and goodwill are cut short for Laharl and his friends as they encounter a Delinquent Teacher.

name: Miser's Collection
description: Usalia and the Mage are worried they won't make it to Christmas on time. What would Laharl, as Santa, think about that?

name: Xmas Hater
description: Christmas is drawing near, but the presents are only halfway ready. Finally, the evil puppeteer reveals himself in front of the anxious Nether Santas!

name: Mirror Cake and Prinnies
description: Mirror Cake is an indispensable part of the traditional festivities in Snow Melody Village. However, no one could have foreseen the turmoil the Mirror Cake would actually cause...

name: Mirror Cake Lab
description: An agonized scream echoed throughout the Netherworld. Fubuki, and others, rushed to the scene. What they saw was...

name: The Avenger of Traditional Cuisine
description: With Mao on board, it should have been easy to take back the New Year Food. But to everyone's surprise, Mr. You-Know-Who stood in the way.

name: Shinobi's Resolve?
description: Fubuki and his friends were making steady progress in reclaiming food from the Mirror Cake Prinny. But just as they thought everything was going well, something strange happened to Rozalin.

name: The Place Where It All Began
description: The party arrived at Snow Melody Village, where everything had begun. The fight against the Mirror Cake Prinny had finally come to an end!

name: A Tanuki's Lucky Balls
description: In front of the Prinny Kurtis, who was feeling the limits of his power, a Prinny with an old map appeared.

name: Bambrooms of Mt. Demon
description:
In the mountains hides a legendary ingredient that has been struggling
...no, evolving since the beginning of time!

name: Staff of Change
description: Kurtis is frustrated by his constant failures and begins searching for the next item to shake off his anxiety.

name: Ra's Mirror Cake
description: Don't tell me... Mirror Cake again.

name: On Being a Hero
description: What's the difference? Such harsh words cut him deep. Suddenly, Mr. You-Know-Who appeared in front of a confused Kurtis!?

name: Modified Prinny Conquest Battle
description: The Prinnies had been mercilessly remodeled by Mao, purely for fun. They had gained enhancement, but at a terrible cost, and now they wanted vengeance...

name: NBP Grand Opening!
description: A flyer reached Laharl. It was the beginning of a nightmare.

name: Demon Cutie Advent
description: Girl Laharl and her friends are making their way through the intricate NBP venue. Just then, a second assassin shows up.

name: Beauty Hero
description: Girl Laharl forges onward with all her strength in order to regain her original form. Will her next opponent be an easier one?

name: Definition of Beauty
description: Girl Laharl is tired from a series of perverse battles. Hopefully the next opponent will be an upstanding one...

name: On True Beauty
description: Finally, the finale. Girl Laharl vows to beat Mid-Boss to win the championship and return to her original form.

name: Course on Chaos, Part 1
description: Raspberyl, the legendary graduate, her attempts to inspire new graduates from the Evil Academy to follow in her footsteps begins now.

name: Course on Chaos, Part 2
description: While training with Zeroken, the group attempts to move forward. However, the 2nd substitute Delinquent Teachers stand in their way.

name: Course on Chaos, Part 3
description: The group overcomes the 2nd substitute Delinquent Teachers and moves on. But for how long will their success continue?

name: Course on Chaos, Part 4
description: With all modules completed. The only thing left is to go back to the academy. At least that was the plan...

name: Course on Chaos, Part 5
description: Ms. Raspberyl spoke to Kyoko and Asuka, who had no idea what they were lacking, even after the brawl.

name: Modified Prinny Conquest Battle
description: The Prinnies had been mercilessly remodeled by Mao, purely for fun. They had gained enhancement, but at a terrible cost, and now they wanted vengeance...

name: Path of Admiring Sakura
description: "Let's go see the sakura!" Sicily had no idea of the sequence of events that these words would set in motion.

name: Magic Cutie Techniques
description: Despite Sicily's confusion at suddenly transforming into a Magic Cutie, Pure Flonne didn't hesitate to slaughter the enemies. But what about the sakura?

name: Salvation of Love
description: The group chases after Darktina with Pure Sicily in the lead. All the while, Pure Sicily keeps practicing her Magic Cutie Techniques.

name: Love's Miracle
description: Darktina's blow hit Love Oracle causing great damage. The fate of Love Oracle... what will it be!?

name: On Being a Magic Cutie
description: Together with their new companion, Puretina, the party goes to the final battle to stop Love Oracle.

name: A Challenge from the Prism Rangers!
Netherworld Cat Cafe
description: A cat cafe has opened in the Netherworld! Someone unexpected appears in front of Etna, who is only there for the desserts and has no interest in cats.

name: Partnership
description: Virunga, the manager, has regained his composure. But why did Virunga open a cat cafe in the Netherworld?

name: Association for Feline Rights
description: Before everyone knows it, the cats have escaped from the cafe!? Where have the cats gone!!

name: A Third Party Emerges!?
description: Prinnies suddenly rush in. Will a three-way battle involving the Association for Feline Rights begin?

name: A Bro's True Intentions
description: The party takes a break after a heated battle with the Sardine Doods, but then they notice something strange.

name: Fairy, Conquest Version
description: The Fairies had been mercilessly remodeled by Mao, purely for fun. They had gained enhancement, but at a terrible cost, and now they wanted vengeance...

name: Undead, Conquest Version
description: The Undead had been mercilessly remodeled by Mao, purely for fun. They had gained enhancement, but at a terrible cost, and now they wanted vengeance...

name: Sludge, Conquest Version
description: The Sludges had been mercilessly remodeled by Mao, purely for fun. They had gained enhancement, but at a terrible cost, and now they wanted vengeance...

name: Bread Eating Competition
description: Raspberyl aims to win the championship to abolish short shorts. However, the road to victory is not an easy one.

name: Scavenger Hunt
description: Raspberyl aims to win the championship with the help of Fuka and Ayame. But the opponent in the next event is not going to be easy to deal with!

name: Three-legged Race
description: The fest-evil is entering its long middle stretch. Tiredness begins to show on the faces of Raspberyl and the others. Then Mr. You-Know-Who appears before them.

name: Gymnastic Formation?
description: Next up: Gymnastic Formation! At last, an event other than running. Raspberyl and her friends should be happy about this...

name: Chicken Fight
description: A clear victory! This startling declaration from Mao baffled the clueless Raspberyl and her equally clumsy friends.

name: The Game Begins
description: Laharl and his partners arrived at the Game Show venue and experienced a certain new game...

name: Overlord Vanquisher
description: Who is exactly "the chosen one" Asagi mentioned...?

name: Grudge
description: The squad is on their way to the Overlord's Castle. However, Asagi's footsteps are weighed down.

name: Doomsday Overlord's Castle
description: The squad arrives at the castle of Asagi, the Doomsday Overlord. The final battle is about to start!

name: Behind the Scenes
description: The heroes defeated the Overlord and beat the game! Since this is only a demo version, there are no post-game credits. Stay safe and return to the real world.

name: Monster on the Prowl
description: The bright sun, the white sand, and the clear sea! This is a great place to soak up the summertime. But things won't be that simple...

name: Search Monster
description: To find the monster, Meaver, Etna, and Emizel are searching along the coast. At this point, Prinnies are...

name: Not Done Playing
description: The squad has defeated a number of minions, but the one behind all this is nowhere to be found. The sweltering heat and the lack of desserts is making Etna impatient...

name: Monster Discovered?
description: The group has accepted a new member. Now they can definitely defeat the giant monster! Soon, the seaside resort will be open again!

name: For the Seaside Resort
description: The Giant Monster (?) Desco and Meaver had a fierce fight, and the seaside restored its peace.

name: Start Treasure Hunt
description: In order to find Etna, Girl Laharl and her partners arrived at the seaside and started collecting clues at the Sea Club.

name: Treasure Island Labyrinth
description: Led by Marlene, Girl Laharl and her partners made it to Treasure Island. There, they encountered treasure-hunting rivals.

name: Lifeguard
description: Things usually don't go the way you expect them to.

name: Real Treasure Hunters
description: Having escaped a close call, Girl Laharl and her partners continued their journey towards the depths of Treasure Island, wondering what exactly they will find.

name: The True Treasure
description: There is no treasure in the ruins, only the ocean lays ahead of the squad. Where exactly is the treasure?

name: Eliminating Transformed Succubi
description: Purely for his own amusement, Mao has ruthlessly transformed Succubi! Though their powers have increased, they have lost something important and set out a quest for vengeance...

name: Long-awaited Summer Fest
description: Valvatorez is devastated to hear that the sardine fireworks are not completed yet. What exactly has happened?

name: Patrons of Summer Fest
description: Valvatorez told Yukimaru that a summer fest just isn't the same without sardines. Does a summer fest really need sardines...?

name: Roadside Stalls
description: The squad wandered around the square when their tummies began to rumble. At that moment, the sweet aroma of food attracted them to a roadside stall.

name: Best Date Location?
description: The sardine fireworks are still far from complete. Meanwhile, Hibana is tailing after a couple who are enjoying the festival.

name: Nearly Time for Fireworks
description: Valvatorez brought everyone to a perfect place to enjoy the fireworks. There, a group of Prinnies were performing a strange dance...

name: Summoning the Seven Deadly Sins
description: The Summoner's Pot is said to have the power to summon beings from another realm. Is it really possible?

name: The Missing Ones
description: As the name "the Seven Deadly Sins" implies, there should be seven members. But where are the others?

name: An Unexpected Team
description: Laharl had no idea that the outcome would be decided by such an unreasonable battle. Maybe the next fight will be a bit fairer?

name: Fashion Contest
description: Were they just playing around all this time? The real fight is finally on. It's time for the female members to show their true skills!

name: Contest Results
description: There is no way that all of the battles with the Seven Deadly Sins can end in total defeat. Laharl decided to challenge Meliodas again...

name: A New Mission!
description: We have an emergency! A magic mirror has appeared in the Netherworld! Go and find out why!

name: Matt Heads to the Castle
description: The squad heads to Laharl's castle, in hopes of receiving his help. When they arrived, they heard some weird noises.

name: Magic Mirror Scramble
description: Just as the Cutie V Rangers and Matt are busy looking for Matt's Dark Mirror, that guy appeared in front of them!!

name: Another Hero?
description: When the squad was busy purifying Matt's Dark Mirror, another hero appeared...

name: Matt's Wish
description: The final battle for ownership of Matt's Dark Mirror has finally begun! Defeat enemies with the powers of love and justice!

name: Halloween Monster
description: On Halloween, a terrifying sound resonates across the entire Netherworld. The sounds are actually coming from a large number of...

name: The Witch of Halloween
description: A window is broken, and glass shards are scattered all over the place. Who on earth has broken into the castle?!

name: Making a Lantern
description: The squad is chasing after Jennifer, escaping with a cauldron in her hands. A sturdy gate stands in their way... It's the time for your axe, Artina!

name: A New Halloween Game
description: Want to take a little break? How about playing a game perfectly suited to the Halloween atmosphere?

name: Halloween Party
description: The squad has finally caught up with Jennifer. Can they destroy the cauldron and stop the panic caused by the Zombies?

name: Eliminating Transformed Gargoyles
description: Purely for his own amusement, Mao has ruthlessly transformed the Gargoyles! Though their powers have increased, they have lost something important and set out a quest for vengeance...

name: Ritual Questions
description: A large number of guests have come to the party for the first anniversary of DISGAEA RPG. The party is about to start!

name: 1st Post-Game Show
description: Though the opening ceremony was canceled, the main event of the party is just about to begin! Spin the Wheel!

name: 2nd Post-Game Show
description: The content of this show, is completely determined by the roulette wheel. Who will spin it? What will the outcome be?

name: 3rd Post-Game Show
description: Seraphina is angry because she didn't get to see the clip she wanted to. With her unwavering determination, she walks straight to the roulette wheel.

name: Finale Time
description: The party is about to end, everyone has had a great time. Killia goes to the stage and prepares to give the closing speech to the guests...

name: Thank You Fest Special Battle ①
Thank You Fest Special Battle ②
Eliminating Transformed Shrooms
description: Purely for his own amusement, Mao has ruthlessly transformed Shrooms! Though their powers have increased, they have lost something important and set out a quest for vengeance...

name: A Crisis at Christmas?!
description: Adell is rushing around, preparing for the Christmas party. Will his decoration work be a success?

name: A New Santa!
description: Adell and his partners cleared up Noel's misunderstanding and chased after Usalia. Where exactly did Usalia go?

name: Expanding Chaos
description: Adell and his partners chased after Usalia, who had turned into Dark Santa. The chase itself was causing more and more chaos.

name: Christmas Eve Fuss
description: In the end, Adell and his partners caught up with Usalia. Just when Adell thought he could get his presents back, she appeared.

name: A Christmas Full of Suspense
description: Adell and Rozalin are friends again. Now, the squad just needs to get the presents back and restore Usalia to her former self!

name: New Year Visit
description: Sicily and her friends went out for a New Year's visit. She was after a legendary diviner that is said to tell the future with 100% accuracy. What will their fate be? Good, or bad?

name: Prinny God's Boon
description: Girl Laharl was taken captive and Sicily is deeply troubled, not knowing what to do. Could this be caused by the divination...

name: A Loving Brother
description: Having gained her new power, Sicily chased after the diviner. As she advanced, she met an unexpected person.

name: Sister's Superiority
description: Just when Sicily is anxiously trying to restore Laharl back to normal, the Strongest Sister comes to block her path?

name: Stop the Wedding!
description: Having overcome countless obstacles, Sicily and her partners continued on. Can they reach the wedding venue before Girl Laharl says her vows?!

name: Eliminating Transformed Felynns
description: Purely for his own amusement, Mao has ruthlessly transformed Felynns! Though their powers have increased, they have lost something important and set out a quest for vengeance...

name: Another Protagonist Contest?
description: That zombie protagonist has appeared in front of Laharl again?!

name: Clash of Forces
description: The fierce fight against Zed spread throughout the entire Netherworld. This commotion attracted the attention of a certain demon...

name: Hopes of a Happy Ending
description: Zed is determined to show Laharl his true power. Will he impress Laharl?

name: Grand Finale?
description: The situation doesn't look good. And Zed decides to play his trump card.

name: Woes of Protagonists
description: Despite endless messy battles in the past, the protagonists are destined to fight with all their might once more!

name: Eliminating Transformed Slumber Cats
description: Purely for his own amusement, Mao has ruthlessly transformed Slumber Cats! Though their powers have increased, they have lost something important and set out a quest for vengeance...

name: Those That Were Lost
description: You awake in an unknown location...

name: Returning Home
description: The demons and the Overlord... Surely they know a way to get you back to your world?

name: Time to Search the Netherworld!
description: Finding the super hero is important, but you can't do anything on an empty stomach...

name: An Encounter with The Final Boss
description: You ate some food and you're raring to go! Shame there's no dessert... That'd be nice.

name: Defeat the Mastermind
description: The party finally squares off against the super hero. Will they make it home in one piece?

name: La Pucelle and Demons
description: Straw Doll Festival arrives! The demons are even more restless than normal. An unknown presence appears in the Netherworld.

name: Salvation of the Scriptures
description: The party moves through the Netherworld, trying to find their lost allies. Prier asks Beryl a question.

name: Marksman Show
description: Along with Alouette, they proceed forward and come across a venue for a marksman show...

name: The Secret to Releasing Stress
description: A familiar voice soothes the party with its relaxing sound.

name: Keeping a Promise
description: The allies are assembled, all done! But before going home, promises must be kept.

name: Protagonist Contest Continues
description: Zed and Laharl continue the Protagonist Contest. Who will show up to stop them?

name: Bro Fight!
description: The Bro Fight, an idea that spawned from a suggestion by Ivar. Zed was thought to be the number one contender, but an unexpected assassin appears...

name: Beautiful Happy Ending
description: Melodia and Mid-Boss show up and the Protagonist Contest descends into chaos. Throw the Prism Rangers into the mix and things get even wilder.

name: Get Those Little Sisters Back!
description: Bieko and Sicily have been kidnapped! Piyori and Axel, along with some super-rich people, seem to be pulling the strings...

name: And Then, The Battle
description: Laharl and Zed realize Piyori and the others' true plan. The whole affair should be reaching its end without any problems, but...

name: XENO Returns
description: Mao and company, threatened by XENO, decide to summon beings known as Holy Defenders to even the odds.

name: Brutal Pair
description: General Emizel XENO suddenly appears in front of Mao and the others. There are also two other XENOs who love muscles and social media...

name: Brutal Batter
description: Emizel XENO reveals that Zenon is alive. What is Saint Etna's mission, and what is her link to Zenon?

name: Brutal Frog
description: Tink XENO and his group were the masterminds behind the current turmoil. Who could Tink XENO's "teacher" be?

name: vs. Strategist
description: Emizel XENO may have appeared to flee, but the general's power exceeds all expectations when backed into a corner...

name: Eliminating Transformed Nine-Tails
description: Purely for his own amusement, Mao has ruthlessly transformed Nine-Tails! Though their powers have increased, they have lost something important and set out a quest for vengeance...

name: Love Laboratory Danger?!
description: Informed of the danger to the Love Laboratory, Rozalin decides to reexamine the classic Love Laboratory routine, but...

name: Mysterious Hunky Transfer Student
description: Sweet Omega and a certain hottie were supposed to help, but Seraphina suddenly shows up!

name: Tria's Difficulties
description: The next casting candidate is Fenrich. It's gonna go badly if he ends up playing a steward...

name: The Ideal Male Cast
description: The last male casting candidate is a real beauty! They seem excited, but there's a pretty big problem...

name: A Nearby Trump Card
description: Unable to find any new cast members, the Love Laboratory crew can't see a way forward. Sinister forces are focused on Rozalin!

name: Spooky School and the Meaver Expedition
description: Fuka and the others arrive at a deserted island owned by Misedor. There are legends of a patron saint and treasure on the island...

name: Suspicious Backroom Deals?!
description: A sunburnt Lucy explains that shady deals were being made on this island, and she's investigating undercover.

name: Fish Farming Worries
description: The shady deals Lucy mentioned turned out to be a simple sardine farm, but the number of fish doesn't add up...

name: Those Who Disturb the Ocean's Sleep
description: Amane says that the patron saints have become enraged by the fish farming equipment. Hearing this, two people's faces grow pale...

name: Ocean Volunteering!
description: The sea grows violent with the anger of the patron saint. The demons must now attempt to calm them...

name: Player Kidnapping?!
description: Petta suddenly appears from another world. She claims that she has come to abduct the Overlord trainer to save her father...

name: Makai Kingdom RPG
description: Zetta, the "universal strongest overlord", appears before Petta can carry out her kidnapping plan. Flonne, Etna and Laharl come running.

name: Genius vs. Genius
description: Hearing that someone has been kidnapped, Mao has shown up to help, but according to him, someone has been spreading rumors...

name: The True Culprit Appears
description: The mastermind behind the attempt on Zetta's life was a man calling himself Seedle, Lord of the Underworld, but why is Zed with him?

name: Season 2?
description: With the truth coming to light, the protagonist and company assemble, but Seedle, Lord of the Underworld, hasn't given up yet...

name: Summoning the Seven Deadly Sins
description: The Summoner's Pot is said to have the power to summon beings from another realm. Is it really possible?

name: The Missing Ones
description: As the name "the Seven Deadly Sins" implies, there should be seven members. But where are the others?

name: An Unexpected Team
description: Laharl had no idea that the outcome would be decided by such an unreasonable battle. Maybe the next fight will be a bit fairer?

name: Fashion Contest
description: Were they just playing around all this time? The real fight is finally on. It's time for the female members to show their true skills!

name: Contest Results
description: There is no way that all of the battles with the Seven Deadly Sins can end in total defeat. Laharl decided to challenge Meliodas again...

name: For Sale Shock
description: One day, a "For Sale" board appears at Etna's Summer Resort. Is this some kind of prank?

name: Real Estate Rumors
description: Who was the culprit who put up Etna's Summer Resort for sale?

name: The First Visitor
description: While the group is hunting the culprit, a rich-looking woman shows up looking to buy the Summer Resort...

name: The Next Visitor
description: A new assassin with their sights on the Summer Resort appears. It's Genjuro Kazamatsuri, creator of the Final Weapon!

name: Coup D'Etat!
description: Who was the real culprit who put up Etna's Summer Resort for sale?

name: Magis from Another World
description: Beyond a never-before-seen gate, a world unknown to Madoka and the others seemed to extend forever.

name: The Netherworld in a Pinch
description:
A girl appeared in front of Madoka and the others.
Upon talking to her, it was apparent she was a Magi, too.

name: The Cause of the Confusion Was...
description: According to Pure Flonne, there are other Magis somewhere being controlled...

name: The Truth of the Matter
description:
The group saved Puretina.
Nevertheless, amidst that something was still bothering Homura...

name: Debut!! Demonic Magi Pure☆Magica
description: Separated from Pure Sicily at the Ward, Laharl was overcome with panic. The thing that was proposed then was the Remote Dark Assembly!

name: Conquest Battle The Modified Death
description: The Deaths had been mercilessly modified as a result of Mao's pastime! In exchange for enhancing their strength, they sacrificed something important, and their revenge was just beginning.

name: Commemorating 2000th Anniversary!
description:
DISGAEA RPG is also welcoming its anniversary!
There, a mysterious Prinny appeared...

name: The 1st Targets
description: The reason that Miss Pleinair is targeting the protagonists of this world is...

name: Evil Otherworldly Radio Waves
description:
Laharl and the others are being controlled by a future weapon in the possession of Miss Pleinair.
Who will control this weapon in 2,000 years from now?!

name: There's Nothing Left to Do!
description: Who is the mysterious woman who showed up in front of Rozalin and the others?!

name: Defeat the Otherworldly Radio Waves!
description: Future Usalia and the others found a method for defeating the otherworldly radio waves. Will they be able to save the protagonists?

name: An Invitation to the N.F.C.
description:
An Invitation to the N.F.C. has arrived! 
According to Flonne, before participating, that thing will be necessary...

name: 4D Netherworld
description:
The place they were guided to by Sicily was the 4D Netherworld.
Here, "Super Reincarnation" is possible...

name: New · Etna's Summer Resort
description:
We were taken by Etna to a Summer Resort.
Here, it is now possible to power up more weapons than ever before...

name: New Mao's Lab (Tentative)
description: New fiercest updates at Mao's Lab?!

name: Netherworld Fighting Championship Is Mine
description:
Now that joining the Netherworld Fighting Championship is definite,
the most important thing is...

name: A Tragic Party Venue
description:
Seraphina and the others carried out preparations for the Christmas Party.
Appearing there in bright red garb was...

name: Grand Entrance of Santa Claus
description: There is apparently a reason that Usalia and Noel are chasing Torachiyo.

name: The Misfortune of Dark Santa
description:
Laharl, who became a Dark Santa,
was also mercilessly given an enormous volume of rice balls.

name: Rice Balls for the Couple
description:
Adell and Rozalin were enjoying Christmas together.
The clutches of evil approached the two.

name: The Rice Ball Samurai, Last Stand
description:
Torachiyo, who found out that people weren't happy
with her presents of rice balls, was incredibly shocked...

name: Hidden Area
description: Red Armor!? Rice Ball Samurai Debuts! (Hidden)

name: Trouble in the New Year
description:
Etna was excited to make her New Year's Visit to the shrine.
But before departing, Girl Laharl's scream rang out through the castle.

name: A Surprising Friendship?
description: The two who whispered words of love to each other at Fuka's guidance were unexpected.

name: Ah, That's How You Should Be!
description:
The ultimate weapon that forcefully makes people hold hands
with each other is being sold by the God of Love...

name: Battle off, Tiger Fuka!
description: The real reason that Fuka seeks out rare love is that...

name: The End of Love and Trouble
description:
Fuka's master, the God of Love,
was that person who once caused everyone trouble with a written oracle!

name: Hidden Area
description: Love and Trouble! ? Tiger's Shrine Visit! (Hidden)

name: Conquest Battle The Modified Living Armor
description:
The Living armors had been mercilessly modified as a result of Mao's pastime!
In exchange for enhancing their strength, they sacrificed something important,
and their revenge was just beginning.

name: La Pucelle and Demons
description: Straw Doll Festival arrives! The demons are even more restless than normal. An unknown presence appears in the Netherworld.

name: Salvation of the Scriptures
description: The party moves through the Netherworld, trying to find their lost allies. Prier asks Beryl a question.

name: Marksman Show
description: Along with Alouette, they proceed forward and come across a venue for a marksman show...

name: The Secret to Releasing Stress
description: A familiar voice soothes the party with its relaxing sound.

name: Keeping a Promise
description: The allies are assembled, all done! But before going home, promises must be kept.

name: Hidden Area
description: Straw Doll Festival with the Saintess (Hidden)

name: The Game Begins
description: Laharl and his partners arrived at the Game Show venue and experienced a certain new game...

name: Overlord Vanquisher
description: Who is exactly "the chosen one" Asagi mentioned...?

name: Grudge
description: The squad is on their way to the Overlord's Castle. However, Asagi's footsteps are weighed down.

name: Doomsday Overlord's Castle
description: The squad arrives at the castle of Asagi, the Doomsday Overlord. The final battle is about to start!

name: Behind the Scenes
description: The heroes defeated the Overlord and beat the game! Since this is only a demo version, there are no post-game credits. Stay safe and return to the real world.

name: Getting Lost
description:
It was Laharl's Overlord's Castle that Visco
and Hundred Knight reached in the dark.

name: Searching for the Crack in Dimensions
description:
Magic and Science.
What Metallia became interested in was a certain laboratory.

name: Ryubence Appears
description:
It was a pumpkin witch who appeared in front of Metallia
and the others as they searched for the crack in dimensions.

name: Evil, the Two of Them
description: It was a witch who loved Vulcanus, who uses the forbidden book of magic.

name: Witch vs. Overlord
description:
They were relieved for only an instant in finding the crack in the dimensions.
It was Hundred Knight and a fearlessly laughing Metallia who drew their blades...

name: Hidden Area
description: Invasion! The Evil Witch and the Majin! (Hidden)

name: Love Laboratory Danger?!
description: Informed of the danger to the Love Laboratory, Rozalin decides to reexamine the classic Love Laboratory routine, but...

name: Mysterious Hunky Transfer Student
description: Sweet Omega and a certain hottie were supposed to help, but Seraphina suddenly shows up!

name: Tria's Difficulties
description: The next casting candidate is Fenrich. It's gonna go badly if he ends up playing a steward...

name: The Ideal Male Cast
description: The last male casting candidate is a real beauty! They seem excited, but there's a pretty big problem...

name: A Nearby Trump Card
description: Unable to find any new cast members, the Love Laboratory crew can't see a way forward. Sinister forces are focused on Rozalin!

name: Halloween Monster
description: On Halloween, a terrifying sound resonates across the entire Netherworld. The sounds are actually coming from a large number of...

name: The Witch of Halloween
description: A window is broken, and glass shards are scattered all over the place. Who on earth has broken into the castle?!

name: Making a Lantern
description: The squad is chasing after Jennifer, escaping with a cauldron in her hands. A sturdy gate stands in their way... It's the time for your axe, Artina!

name: A New Halloween Game
description: Want to take a little break? How about playing a game perfectly suited to the Halloween atmosphere?

name: Halloween Party
description: The squad has finally caught up with Jennifer. Can they destroy the cauldron and stop the panic caused by the Zombies?

name: Follow your feelings
description: Maybe it's because of the Santa costume, but Usalia and the Mage sense a mysterious presence. What will it reveal to them?

name: Knew it Was You
description: Prinnies bearing gifts were seen by Laharl and the others. Could they be the masterminds behind all this?

name: Evil Academy's Holy Night
description: The Evil Academy on Christmas Eve. Cheer and goodwill are cut short for Laharl and his friends as they encounter a Delinquent Teacher.

name: Miser's Collection
description: Usalia and the Mage are worried they won't make it to Christmas on time. What would Laharl, as Santa, think about that?

name: Xmas Hater
description: Christmas is drawing near, but the presents are only halfway ready. Finally, the evil puppeteer reveals himself in front of the anxious Nether Santas!

name: Mirror Cake and Prinnies
description: Mirror Cake is an indispensable part of the traditional festivities in Snow Melody Village. However, no one could have foreseen the turmoil the Mirror Cake would actually cause...

name: Mirror Cake Lab
description: An agonized scream echoed throughout the Netherworld. Fubuki, and others, rushed to the scene. What they saw was...

name: The Avenger of Traditional Cuisine
description: With Mao on board, it should have been easy to take back the New Year Food. But to everyone's surprise, Mr. You-Know-Who stood in the way.

name: Shinobi's Resolve?
description: Fubuki and his friends were making steady progress in reclaiming food from the Mirror Cake Prinny. But just as they thought everything was going well, something strange happened to Rozalin.

name: The Place Where It All Began
description: The party arrived at Snow Melody Village, where everything had begun. The fight against the Mirror Cake Prinny had finally come to an end!

name: A Tanuki's Lucky Balls
description: In front of the Prinny Kurtis, who was feeling the limits of his power, a Prinny with an old map appeared.

name: Bambrooms of Mt. Demon
description:
In the mountains hides a legendary ingredient that has been struggling
...no, evolving since the beginning of time!

name: Staff of Change
description: Kurtis is frustrated by his constant failures and begins searching for the next item to shake off his anxiety.

name: Ra's Mirror Cake
description: Don't tell me... Mirror Cake again.

name: On Being a Hero
description: What's the difference? Such harsh words cut him deep. Suddenly, Mr. You-Know-Who appeared in front of a confused Kurtis!?

name: NBP Grand Opening!
description: A flyer reached Laharl. It was the beginning of a nightmare.

name: Demon Cutie Advent
description: Girl Laharl and her friends are making their way through the intricate NBP venue. Just then, a second assassin shows up.

name: Beauty Hero
description: Girl Laharl forges onward with all her strength in order to regain her original form. Will her next opponent be an easier one?

name: Definition of Beauty
description: Girl Laharl is tired from a series of perverse battles. Hopefully the next opponent will be an upstanding one...

name: On True Beauty
description: Finally, the finale. Girl Laharl vows to beat Mid-Boss to win the championship and return to her original form.

name: Course on Chaos, Part 1
description: Raspberyl, the legendary graduate, her attempts to inspire new graduates from the Evil Academy to follow in her footsteps begins now.

name: Course on Chaos, Part 2
description: While training with Zeroken, the group attempts to move forward. However, the 2nd substitute Delinquent Teachers stand in their way.

name: Course on Chaos, Part 3
description: The group overcomes the 2nd substitute Delinquent Teachers and moves on. But for how long will their success continue?

name: Course on Chaos, Part 4
description: With all modules completed. The only thing left is to go back to the academy. At least that was the plan...

name: Course on Chaos, Part 5
description: Ms. Raspberyl spoke to Kyoko and Asuka, who had no idea what they were lacking, even after the brawl.

name: Path of Admiring Sakura
description: "Let's go see the sakura!" Sicily had no idea of the sequence of events that these words would set in motion.

name: Magic Cutie Techniques
description: Despite Sicily's confusion at suddenly transforming into a Magic Cutie, Pure Flonne didn't hesitate to slaughter the enemies. But what about the sakura?

name: Salvation of Love
description: The group chases after Darktina with Pure Sicily in the lead. All the while, Pure Sicily keeps practicing her Magic Cutie Techniques.

name: Love's Miracle
description: Darktina's blow hit Love Oracle causing great damage. The fate of Love Oracle... what will it be!?

name: On Being a Magic Cutie
description: Together with their new companion, Puretina, the party goes to the final battle to stop Love Oracle.

name: Netherworld Cat Cafe
description: A cat cafe has opened in the Netherworld! Someone unexpected appears in front of Etna, who is only there for the desserts and has no interest in cats.

name: Partnership
description: Virunga, the manager, has regained his composure. But why did Virunga open a cat cafe in the Netherworld?

name: Association for Feline Rights
description: Before everyone knows it, the cats have escaped from the cafe!? Where have the cats gone!!

name: A Third Party Emerges!?
description: Prinnies suddenly rush in. Will a three-way battle involving the Association for Feline Rights begin?

name: A Bro's True Intentions
description: The party takes a break after a heated battle with the Sardine Doods, but then they notice something strange.

name: Bread Eating Competition
description: Raspberyl aims to win the championship to abolish short shorts. However, the road to victory is not an easy one.

name: Scavenger Hunt
description: Raspberyl aims to win the championship with the help of Fuka and Ayame. But the opponent in the next event is not going to be easy to deal with!

name: Three-legged Race
description: The fest-evil is entering its long middle stretch. Tiredness begins to show on the faces of Raspberyl and the others. Then Mr. You-Know-Who appears before them.

name: Gymnastic Formation?
description: Next up: Gymnastic Formation! At last, an event other than running. Raspberyl and her friends should be happy about this...

name: Chicken Fight
description: A clear victory! This startling declaration from Mao baffled the clueless Raspberyl and her equally clumsy friends.

name: Monster on the Prowl
description: The bright sun, the white sand, and the clear sea! This is a great place to soak up the summertime. But things won't be that simple...

name: Search Monster
description: To find the monster, Meaver, Etna, and Emizel are searching along the coast. At this point, Prinnies are...

name: Not Done Playing
description: The squad has defeated a number of minions, but the one behind all this is nowhere to be found. The sweltering heat and the lack of desserts is making Etna impatient...

name: Monster Discovered?
description: The group has accepted a new member. Now they can definitely defeat the giant monster! Soon, the seaside resort will be open again!

name: For the Seaside Resort
description: The Giant Monster (?) Desco and Meaver had a fierce fight, and the seaside restored its peace.

name: Start Treasure Hunt
description: In order to find Etna, Girl Laharl and her partners arrived at the seaside and started collecting clues at the Sea Club.

name: Treasure Island Labyrinth
description: Led by Marlene, Girl Laharl and her partners made it to Treasure Island. There, they encountered treasure-hunting rivals.

name: Lifeguard
description: Things usually don't go the way you expect them to.

name: Real Treasure Hunters
description: Having escaped a close call, Girl Laharl and her partners continued their journey towards the depths of Treasure Island, wondering what exactly they will find.

name: The True Treasure
description: There is no treasure in the ruins, only the ocean lays ahead of the squad. Where exactly is the treasure?

name: Long-awaited Summer Fest
description: Valvatorez is devastated to hear that the sardine fireworks are not completed yet. What exactly has happened?

name: Patrons of Summer Fest
description: Valvatorez told Yukimaru that a summer fest just isn't the same without sardines. Does a summer fest really need sardines...?

name: Roadside Stalls
description: The squad wandered around the square when their tummies began to rumble. At that moment, the sweet aroma of food attracted them to a roadside stall.

name: Best Date Location?
description: The sardine fireworks are still far from complete. Meanwhile, Hibana is tailing after a couple who are enjoying the festival.

name: Nearly Time for Fireworks
description: Valvatorez brought everyone to a perfect place to enjoy the fireworks. There, a group of Prinnies were performing a strange dance...
